title: yolov3.spp.yaml
body:
### Search before asking

- [X] I have searched the YOLOv3 [issues](https://github.com/ultralytics/yolov3/issues) and [discussions](https://github.com/ultralytics/yolov3/discussions) and found no similar questions.


### Question

good job! this is an amazing change for yolov3 based on yolov5 repo. i have a question, I want to change the structure of yolov3-spp, is it possible to apply the method of changing the network structure of yolov5 to change the structure of my yolov3-sppï¼Ÿ
like this, add spp layer:
head:
  [[-1, 1, Bottleneck, [1024, False]],
   [-1, 1, SPP, [512, [5, 9, 13]]],
   [-1, 1, Conv, [1024, 3, 1]],
   [-1, 1, Conv, [512, 1, 1]],
   [-1, 1, Conv, [1024, 3, 1]],  # 15 (P5/32-large)

   [-2, 1, Conv, [256, 1, 1]],
   [-1, 1, nn.Upsample, [None, 2, 'nearest']],
   [[-1, 8], 1, Concat, [1]],  # cat backbone P4
   **[-1, 1, SPP, [512, [5, 9, 13]]],**
   [-1, 1, Bottleneck, [512, False]],
   [-1, 1, Bottleneck, [512, False]],
   [-1, 1, Conv, [256, 1, 1]],
   [-1, 1, Conv, [512, 3, 1]],  # 22 (P4/16-medium)

   [-2, 1, Conv, [128, 1, 1]],
   [-1, 1, nn.Upsample, [None, 2, 'nearest']],
   [[-1, 6], 1, Concat, [1]],  # cat backbone P3
   [-1, 1, Bottleneck, [256, False]],
   [-1, 2, Bottleneck, [256, False]],  # 27 (P3/8-small)

   [[28, 23, 15], 1, Detect, [nc, anchors]],   # Detect(P3, P4, P5)
  ]
and test this model by using: python utils/yolo.py --cfg mymodel.yaml
is correct?

thank you very much, sir!

### Additional

_No response_
